title: Show hints/links to Pike stdlib documentation
description: Show inline hints or provide documentation links for Pike stdlib functions. Should show preferred autodoc summary and include a direct link to the official Pike documentation for that function/module.

title: Fix navigation for imports and inheritance
description: Allow Go to Definition on #include paths and inherit statements.

title: Smart intellisense/autocomplete improvements
description: Enhance the intellisense/autocomplete to be smarter - more context-aware, better filtering, prioritize based on scope, usage patterns, etc.

title: Generate getters and setters
description: Add a code action to automatically generate getter and setter methods for selected class variables. Should follow Pike conventions and include proper autodoc comments.

title: Quick autodoc template with //!! trigger
description: Implement a snippet/code action that triggers on '//'\!' (or similar) and automatically generates an autodoc comment template matching the current method signature (params, return type, etc.).

title: Improve Pike Autodoc rendering in Hover
description: Parse and render Pike Autodoc block tags (@mapping, @member, etc) and inline tags (@rfc, @url) as Markdown.

title: Fix formatter
description: The Pike LSP formatter has issues that need investigation and fixing. Determine what's broken and resolve formatter bugs.
